content: Did you know? You can find different items offered in shops on different planets!
info: 日常对话-日常特殊反馈-客机联机-非首次通用对话-12绵朵_联机对话（CB1）

content: Once, I even found anti-static wristbands and spray at the shop on my friend's planet! {A心虚目移}Even though they weren't all that effective...
info: 日常对话-日常特殊反馈-客机联机-非首次通用对话-12绵朵_联机对话（CB1）

content: Later on, that fleece plushie went on its own adventure into the Starsea. {A疑问}I wonder... since you're from out there, have you seen it, meh?
info: 日常对话-日常特殊反馈-客机联机-非首次通用对话-12绵朵_联机对话（CB1）

content: Anyway, try visiting shops on different planets, {A大笑}and you might have some unexpected discoveries.
info: 日常对话-日常特殊反馈-客机联机-非首次通用对话-12绵朵_联机对话（CB1）

content: As a plushie designer, I once tried this material called fleece... But every plushie I made with it looked like it was secretly giggling behind my back.
